img_text: l Verizon LTE イ* 87% ■ 02:38 @ Jet, Q Search Facebook Whiskers, Tails and Ferals Yesterday at 13:03. Awesomeness at its finest!! Four kittens and Momma kitty rescued! Just flown in to the Napa Airport by Tiffany of Pilot N Paws. A HUGE shout out to a great organization transporting animals out of shelters to rescues like us! All rescued and saved by a network of volunteers in the Central Valley. This Mama gave birth to these four cuties along the roadside. Now five weeks later here they are!! It truly takes a village!!.
